name: Alex Nguyen
summary: Creative Director with 5 years of experience in graphic design, game art, and animation. Expert in leading cross-functional teams and delivering high-quality visual assets while adhering to tight deadlines. Skilled in Photoshop, Illustrator, Maya, and Blender, with strong aesthetic judgment in color, lighting, and composition.

experiences.bullets:
Designed and developed branding materials, digital assets, and animations for clients.
Led team brainstorming sessions to generate innovative visual concepts.
Optimized graphic deliverables using advanced techniques in Photoshop and Illustrator.
Worked closely with marketing teams to ensure design alignment with campaign goals.

educations.degree: Bachelor of Arts in Graphic Design

projects.name: Fantasy World 3D Game Art
projects.bullets:
Created all 3D character and environmental assets using Blender and Maya.
Implemented lighting and shading techniques for realistic game aesthetics.

projects.name: Creative Branding for Startup X
projects.bullets:
Designed complete branding package, including logo, marketing collateral, and web visuals.
Collaborated directly with client to capture vision and achieve branding goals.

skills.name: Graphic Design
skills.description: Expert in visual design, brand identity, and UI/UX design.

skills.name: 2D and 3D Art
skills.description: Proficient in Photoshop, Illustrator, Maya, and Blender for asset creation.

skills.name: Creative Leadership
skills.description: Strong ability to mentor teams and direct art production.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.description: Experienced in setting milestones, managing timelines, and ensuring delivery quality.
